variables.label: User ID
variables.description: User ID that the process uses, run (id $user) on your instance to see the ID

variables.label: Group ID
variables.description: Group ID that the process uses, run (id $user) on your instance to see the ID

variables.label: User
variables.description: HTTP basic authentication user name. Default is `abc`

variables.label: Password
variables.description: HTTP basic authentication password. Default is `abc`. If unset there will be no authentication.

instructions.start:
KyArchMind Lab containing full desktop environments in officially supported flavors accessible via any modern web browser.
Please note, that the Docker socket is not mounted and that hardware acceleration is disabled.
instructions.end: KyArchMind has been successfully deployed! It might take few moments before it's fully started. Please turn on "Websocket Support" in the settings. You can access it at http://$$cap_appname.$$cap_root_domain with login user `$$cap_WEBTOP_CUSTOM_USER` and password `$$cap_WEBTOP_PASSWORD`

description: Web hosted lab for kyarchmind students.
